definitions.definition: a small hole made by a sharp object, especially in a tyre:
examples: My bike has had two punctures in the last three weeks.

definitions.definition: to make a small hole in something, or to get a small hole in something:
examples: She had used a screwdriver to puncture two holes in the lid of a paint tin.

definitions.definition: to suddenly make someone less confident or positive:
examples: My positive mood was rather punctured by the news.
